headline: Should You Be Optimistic About Builders FirstSource (BLDR)?
summary: Heartland Advisors, an investment management company, released its “Heartland Value Plus Fund” fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the fourth quarter, the market’s gains continued to widen, as small value stocks outpaced the Magnificent 7, and the artificial intelligence (AI) trade pulled back in November amid concerns […]
